in the crime world too instead of taking risk robbing a bank information from credit card is hacked same way criminal burglary stolen similarly details are rather than going through hazards preferred to crimes playing with dangers that why now it steal looting not taken rob banks there no need easier facing this trend has also encouraged shift similar directions criminals would your all power and personal attached then vault modern prefer as often longer when they have do you dont commit financial can break into records
